categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Samantha Alleyne is a British actress and model who appears in several Star Wars movies released from 2015 to 2019. She appears as a First Order stormtrooper and a communications officer in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens; a Scarif Rebel soldier in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story; a First Order stormtrooper in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi; a standard Imperial stormtrooper and a Mimban stormtrooper in Solo: A Star Wars Story; and a First Order stormtrooper, a Sith trooper, and Allie Samta in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
